bit.body:
[Plugins]

# The enabled plugins and the order in which the plugins are run within each execution phase
plugins = [
  "Init",
  "BlueprintExtractor",
  "BlueprintParser",
  "BitmarkGenerator",
]

[Plugins.Plugin.Init]
path = "@getmorebrain/bitmark-extractor-plugin-init"
Config.imageBaseUri = "https://blueprint.server.com/images/"

[Plugins.Plugin.BlueprintExtractor]
Config.useCachedData = true
path = "@getmorebrain/bitmark-extractor-plugin-blueprint-extractor"
Config.extractionMode = "full"

[Plugins.Plugin.BlueprintParser]
Config.useCachedData = true
path = "@getmorebrain/bitmark-extractor-plugin-blueprint-parser"
Config.Visualization.enabled = true

[Plugins.Plugin.BitmarkGenerator]
Config.useCachedData = true
path = "@getmorebrain/bitmark-extractor-plugin-bitmark-generator"
Config.Visualization.enabled = true

[General]

# Blueprint-specific provider
blueprintProvider = "default"

# Set the base URI for images
imageBaseUri = "https://blueprint.server.com/images/"

# Scale factor for the sizes of all images
imageScale = 2

bitmark:
[.extractor-blueprint-configuration]
[@id:blueprint-config-001]
[%1]
[!Blueprint extractor configuration in TOML]

$$$$
[Plugins]

# The enabled plugins and the order in which the plugins are run within each execution phase
plugins = [
  "Init",
  "BlueprintExtractor",
  "BlueprintParser",
  "BitmarkGenerator",
]

[Plugins.Plugin.Init]
path = "@getmorebrain/bitmark-extractor-plugin-init"
Config.imageBaseUri = "https://blueprint.server.com/images/"

[Plugins.Plugin.BlueprintExtractor]
Config.useCachedData = true
path = "@getmorebrain/bitmark-extractor-plugin-blueprint-extractor"
Config.extractionMode = "full"

[Plugins.Plugin.BlueprintParser]
Config.useCachedData = true
path = "@getmorebrain/bitmark-extractor-plugin-blueprint-parser"
Config.Visualization.enabled = true

[Plugins.Plugin.BitmarkGenerator]
Config.useCachedData = true
path = "@getmorebrain/bitmark-extractor-plugin-bitmark-generator"
Config.Visualization.enabled = true

[General]

# Blueprint-specific provider
blueprintProvider = "default"

# Set the base URI for images
imageBaseUri = "https://blueprint.server.com/images/"

# Scale factor for the sizes of all images
imageScale = 2
